title: Zhanjiang Sports Centre
text: Zhanjiang Sports Centre (<a href="Simplified%20Chinese">Simplified Chinese</a>: 湛江体育中心) is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Zhanjiang">Zhanjiang</a>, <a href="China">China</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The capacity of this stadium is 20,000.
